languages.text: "Хм, из этих троих получится один вполне сносный настоятель. Серьезно — ни один из претендентов не обладает авторитетом покойного Гектархиуса, и кого вы не выберете, другие вряд ли безропотно примут нового главу. Свяжите их клятвами и заставьте работать вместе".

"Hmm. The three of them together would make a passable prelate. I mean it. None of the contenders can match the late Hectarchius in authority, so, regardless of whom you select, the others are unlikely to accept them as their new superior without complaint. You should bind them with oaths and compel them to work together."
languages.original_text: "Хм, из этих троих получится один вполне сносный настоятель. Серьезно — ни один из претендентов не обладает авторитетом покойного Гектархиуса, и кого вы не выберете, другие вряд ли безропотно примут нового главу. Свяжите их клятвами и заставьте работать вместе".

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. The three of them together would make a passable prelate. I mean it. None of the contenders can match the late Hectarchius in authority, so whoever you select, the others are unlikely to meekly accept them as their new superior. Bind them with oaths and compel them to work together."

"Hmm. The three of them together would make a passable prelate. I mean it. None of the contenders can match the late Hectarchius in authority, so whoever you select, the others are unlikely to meekly accept them as their new superior. Bind them with oaths and compel them to work together."

"Hmm. The three of them together would make a passable prelate. I mean it. None of the contenders can match the late Hectarchius in authority, so, regardless of whom you select, the others are unlikely to accept them as their new superior without complaint. You should bind them with oaths and compel them to work together."

"Hmm. The three of them together would make a passable prelate. I mean it. None of the contenders can match the late Hectarchius in authority, so, regardless of whom you select, the others are unlikely to accept them as their new superior without complaint. You should bind them with oaths and compel them to work together."

languages.text: "Hmm. Gemeinsam gäben die drei einen passablen Prälaten ab. Ernsthaft. Keiner der Kandidaten hat die Autorität des verstorbenen Hectarchius. Das heißt, zwei von ihnen werden den von Euch gewählten Kandidaten als neuen Vorgesetzten nicht ohne Protest akzeptieren. Ihr solltet sie mit Eiden dazu zwingen, zusammenzuarbeiten."
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The three of them together would make a passable prelate. I mean it. None of the contenders can match the late Hectarchius in authority, so, regardless of whom you select, the others are unlikely to accept them as their new superior without complaint. You should bind them with oaths and compel them to work together."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. Gemeinsam gäben die drei einen passablen Prälaten ab. Ernsthaft. Keiner der Kandidaten hat die Autorität des verstorbenen Hectarchius. Das heißt, zwei von ihnen werden den von Euch gewählten Kandidaten als neuen Vorgesetzten nicht ohne Protest akzeptieren. Ihr solltet sie mit Eiden dazu zwingen, zusammenzuarbeiten."

languages.text: "Hım... Üçü, birlikte fena sayılmayacak bir piskopos eder. Ciddiyim. Adayların hiçbiri otorite konusunda merhum Hectarchius ile boy ölçüşemez. Bu yüzden kimi seçerseniz seçin, diğerlerinin itiraz etmeden durumu kabul etmesi pek olası değil. Üçünü de yeminlerle bağlamalı ve birlikte çalışmaya zorlamalısınız."
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The three of them together would make a passable prelate. I mean it. None of the contenders can match the late Hectarchius in authority, so, regardless of whom you select, the others are unlikely to accept them as their new superior without complaint. You should bind them with oaths and compel them to work together."

traits.locale_text: "Hım... Üçü, birlikte fena sayılmayacak bir piskopos eder. Ciddiyim. Adayların hiçbiri otorite konusunda merhum Hectarchius ile boy ölçüşemez. Bu yüzden kimi seçerseniz seçin, diğerlerinin itiraz etmeden durumu kabul etmesi pek olası değil. Üçünü de yeminlerle bağlamalı ve birlikte çalışmaya zorlamalısınız."

languages.text: «Hum. Los tres juntos servirían como un prelado medio decente. Lo digo en serio. Ninguno de los aspirantes está a la altura del difunto Hectarchius en lo que respecta a su autoridad, así que no importa a cuál de ellos nombre: los demás no lo aceptarán como su nuevo superior sin protestar. Debería usted responsabilizarlos a todos bajo juramento y así obligarlos a colaborar».
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The three of them together would make a passable prelate. I mean it. None of the contenders can match the late Hectarchius in authority, so, regardless of whom you select, the others are unlikely to accept them as their new superior without complaint. You should bind them with oaths and compel them to work together."

traits.locale_text: «Hum. Los tres juntos servirían como un prelado medio decente. Lo digo en serio. Ninguno de los aspirantes está a la altura del difunto Hectarchius en lo que respecta a su autoridad, así que no importa a cuál de ellos nombre: los demás no lo aceptarán como su nuevo superior sin protestar. Debería usted responsabilizarlos a todos bajo juramento y así obligarlos a colaborar».

languages.text: “嗯，如果是他们三个加起来的话，确实算得上是合格的教长。我没在开玩笑，无论是哪位候选人，都无法与已故的赫克塔奇乌斯相提并论。因此，无论你选择谁，其余两位恐怕都不会毫无怨言地接受这位新来的教长。你应该用誓言来约束他们，迫使他们合作。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The three of them together would make a passable prelate. I mean it. None of the contenders can match the late Hectarchius in authority, so, regardless of whom you select, the others are unlikely to accept them as their new superior without complaint. You should bind them with oaths and compel them to work together."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，如果是他们三个加起来的话，确实算得上是合格的教长。我没在开玩笑，无论是哪位候选人，都无法与已故的赫克塔奇乌斯相提并论。因此，无论你选择谁，其余两位恐怕都不会毫无怨言地接受这位新来的教长。你应该用誓言来约束他们，迫使他们合作。”

languages.text: « Hmm... Ensemble, ils formeraient un prélat passable. Je ne plaisante pas. Aucun des prétendants ne semble disposer d'une autorité similaire à celle de feu Hectarchius. Ainsi, peu importe qui vous choisirez, les autres ne manqueront pas de remettre en question les compétences de leur nouveau supérieur. Vous devriez leur faire prêter serment et les contraindre à collaborer. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The three of them together would make a passable prelate. I mean it. None of the contenders can match the late Hectarchius in authority, so, regardless of whom you select, the others are unlikely to accept them as their new superior without complaint. You should bind them with oaths and compel them to work together."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... Ensemble, ils formeraient un prélat passable. Je ne plaisante pas. Aucun des prétendants ne semble disposer d'une autorité similaire à celle de feu Hectarchius. Ainsi, peu importe qui vous choisirez, les autres ne manqueront pas de remettre en question les compétences de leur nouveau supérieur. Vous devriez leur faire prêter serment et les contraindre à collaborer. »

languages.text: 「ふん。三人まとめてようやくそれなりの高位聖職者一人分だ。本気だ。候補の誰も、故ヘクタルキウスの権威には及ばない。だから誰を選んでも、残りの連中は新しい上を文句なしに受け入れない。誓約で縛って、協力させろ」
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The three of them together would make a passable prelate. I mean it. None of the contenders can match the late Hectarchius in authority, so, regardless of whom you select, the others are unlikely to accept them as their new superior without complaint. You should bind them with oaths and compel them to work together."

traits.locale_text: 「ふん。三人まとめてようやくそれなりの高位聖職者一人分だ。本気だ。候補の誰も、故ヘクタルキウスの権威には及ばない。だから誰を選んでも、残りの連中は新しい上を文句なしに受け入れない。誓約で縛って、協力させろ。」
